author: felicity
msg: bug 3754: cause AI::run() to return a value indicating if there was a problem, and let sa-learn see this and set the exit code to non-zero if there was a problem (such as a file wasn't able to be opened).  also, we used die() in places where we should have been able to recover, so throw a warning instead and recover.

msg: -Enables javadoc plugin to accept wildcards, which is denoted by *, in the excludePackageNames parameter
